dotnetType.name: EnumDeserializerBuilderCase
dotnetType.summary:
A deserializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.EnumSchema" /> and attempts to map it
            to enum types.

overloads.summary: Creates a new enum deserializer builder case.

returns.summary:
A successful result if the resolution is an <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.EnumResolution" /> and the
            schema is an <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.EnumSchema" />; an unsuccessful result otherwise.

overloads.summary: Builds an enum deserializer for a type-schema pair.
The codec that generated deserializers should use for read operations.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EnumDeserializerBuilderCase extends Chr.Avro.Serialization.BinaryDeserializerBuilderCase
